page.title: 14FAMILY OCCUPATIONS.
page.content: Typical families live in terraced, semi-detached and detached houses. They usually consist of a father, mother and children.Most fathers go to work but unemployment is high and about{11.4%}are drawing D.H.S.S. benefit .Children attend school in term time and mother usually do the housework.They cook, go shopping, launder clothes, clean the house, make the beds, help the father to decorate and do the garden. Sometimes they help the family income by doing part time jobs.{Peter's}mother spends five minutes to do the beds. they have sheets and blankets on two double beds and two single beds.{Denise}makes her bed in 30 seconds because she has a duvet.{Anita's}mother spends about four hours to do the family wash by hand because her automatic machine is broken.It usually only takes an hour.
